document.full_text: the euro zone's overall budget gap fell last year but deficits in greece and portugal were higher than expected, underlining the challenges presented by their austerity programs.
document.title: euro zone 2010 deficit down but greece and portugal up
lines_and_colors: the euro zone's overall budget gap fell last year but deficits in greece and portugal were higher than expected, underlining the challenges presented by their austerity programs.
